benchmark_details.name: AWARE BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: AWARE BENCH is a benchmark designed to evaluate awareness in large language models (LLMs), categorizing awareness into five dimensions: capability, mission, emotion, culture, and perspective awareness using the AWARE EVAL dataset.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of AWARE BENCH is to evaluate the awareness of LLMs across five dimensions.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset needs to be enriched conceptually and should include more real-world scenarios.

data.source: Combination of existing datasets and newly generated queries through a human-AI collaborative framework.
data.size: 200 capability awareness questions, 522 mission awareness questions, 200 emotion awareness questions, 500 culture awareness questions
data.annotation: Manual validation and generation through two main phases: seed curation and query generation.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the ratio of correctly answered questions to the total number of questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better awareness and alignment of LLMs with human values.
methodology.baseline_results: Various models evaluated, performance varies with only GPT-4 and GLM-4 achieving an accuracy exceeding 80%.
methodology.validation: Human quality check for generated questions to ensure pertinence and clarity.
